title: Cryptomiles1
author: Cryptomiles1
content: For long now I have been reading lots of interesting testimonies around the forum about their experience and achievement they made through bitcoin progress. Something very important came into me to know how do you feels whenever someone said of their investment and how it yielded and they made fortune out of it. Do you feels your late getting involved to the industry and do you wishes to be like them, and if you were in their shoes would you be able to utilize those opportunity they got or you won't afford to bear the risk and get involved?Lets discuss wisely and get the best from ourselves.

comments.author: notocactus
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptomiles1 on March 14, 2023, 10:52:45 AMFor long now I have been reading lots of interesting testimonies around the forum about their experience and achievement they made through bitcoin progress.I don't know what stories you read but hopefully you did not miss following storiesSatoshi's lessonBitcoin and me (Hal Finney)[Interviews] with Bitcointalk membersEspecially the story from gmaxwell. A legendary Bitcoin developer.Have you read those stories ?

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Of course I should feel happy for people, but these stories got so redundant that I don't even know if the stories are real or if they're fabricating the stories just so they hopefully receive merits.

comments.author: Anonylz
comments.body: Besides feeling impressed and excited to hear other people's experience and encounter with btc, it also makes me realize how the btc awareness is growing, without these different stories you would not really be able to grasp how widespread btc has grown. Particularly people from remote locations. As a bitcoiner you can feel nothing but happiness when you hear fellow bitcoiners benefiting from btc.

comments.author: Lorence.xD
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptomiles1 on March 14, 2023, 10:52:45 AMFor long now I have been reading lots of interesting testimonies around the forum about their experience and achievement they made through bitcoin progress. Something very important came into me to know how do you feels whenever someone said of their investment and how it yielded and they made fortune out of it. By just reading and scrolling here in the forum, I've seen a lot of different stories like they succeed and some loss a huge amount of assets. I conclude that it depends on people's action in this industry whether they can profit big time or not. Of course as I saw successful experiences of other people I feel happy for them and congratulate them.Those kinds of experiences inspires me and motivates me to have a wise decision sharing their thoughts would also help how can I also to be like them. Quote from: Cryptomiles1 on March 14, 2023, 10:52:45 AMDo you feels your late getting involved to the industry and do you wishes to be like them, and if you were in their shoes would you be able to utilize those opportunity they got or you won't afford to bear the risk and get involved?For me I don't feel late or delayed since you can still learn and keep up to the trends these days. If you always feel fomo it will just lead to bad decisions and losses in this industry. Much better to learn more and explore more rather than rushing yourself in this industry, go learn have some knowledge and experiences first. And if I were in theirplace, I must say I could utilize those opportunity, there's nothing to be fear of having risk if you know what you're capable of.

comments.author: riantolie
comments.body: I'm a little bit envious, but people make fortune not only with Bitcoin and there are a lot more successful people than me. I'm just trying to mind my own business and make my own fortune.

comments.author: m2017
comments.body: Of course, such stories can only please, because they clearly show the reality of the fulfillment of their desires, thanks to bitcoin.Feelings that you got into the industry late will not help at the moment and it is better to get rid of them. It is much more productive to feel the new opportunities that the crypto industry creates.I can't be in the place of others, and fantasies on this subject are also useless.Past opportunities are missed and therefore, I try to concentrate on the current ones.

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: It's need a new insight, adoption or movement of Bitcoin, not just same with the others for accepting Bitcoin payment and that's all. I really curious if accepting Bitcoin payment is really make people to pay with Bitcoin or they still tend to use fiat, if only few people want to use Bitcoin, how we can say accepting Bitcoin is a good and help the stores to improve?Also if most people don't understand to pay with Bitcoin, it just make you wasting your time to tell or teach them.

comments.author: Z-tight
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptomiles1 on March 14, 2023, 10:52:45 AMSomething very important came into me to know how do you feels whenever someone said of their investment and how it yielded and they made fortune out of it. I am happy for people who can make money through BTC, but i do not want many people to feel that BTC investment is a means of making a fortune. If everybody shares stories of how they made fortunes through investing in BTC, we cannot even know if the stories are fake or true, but newbies would take it to be true and they may start investing with the hope of making a fortune, which may not happen, and they would not even attempt to learn a thing about BTC, which could make them lose their BTC.Quote from: Cryptomiles1 on March 14, 2023, 10:52:45 AMDo you feels your late getting involved to the industry and do you wishes to be like them, and if you were in their shoes would you be able to utilize those opportunity they got or you won't afford to bear the risk and get involved?I don't know the exact group of people you are talking about, but what i know is that i don't feel late about the time i got involved in BTC investment, but i know if i was involved in BTC very early on, i would have sold a long time ago, but i would have continued to buy more since then, through dca.

comments.author: Godday
comments.body: Everyone has been in a phase where they feel they are in the last queue in the development of bitcoin or cryptocurrency.  Hopefully their people they are too late to invest.  I started getting to know cryptocurrency in 2018 and at that time I already thought that I was too late to invest.  Then look at what happened now?  Compare how much BTC or altcoin was worth at that time to the current price.  Several cryptocurrencies have hit the ATH in 2020 and 2021. I honestly regret that I once unfollowed the crypto world thinking it was too late.  Currently I have about $3,000 in various types of portfolios and I'm sure in the next 3 to 4 years I will get some profit from them

comments.author: bitzizzix
comments.body: If you read the great stories about their involvement in bitcoin in this forum, I think that is a stark reality because they learned a lot and added to their knowledge while here. Because this is where we can learn and also gain knowledge about bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies, and also teach and provide the best information in terms of profit.but you also have to know because out there there are still many investors who experience losses, and that's because they don't get a useful space for them to have enough knowledge about bitcoin and do it without knowledge that makes them wrong and lose.and I don't think it's ever too late to get involved with bitcoin, because bitcoin is the future and also the best long term in terms of profits and also to minimize losses. So do it as long as you have the desire before repeating the delay and regretting it again, and study everything well and don't be lazy to read before getting involved.

comments.author: kryptqnick
comments.body: I believe it depends on a person. We all have different vices, but jealousy isn't one of mine. So I don't feel sorry that I didn't get in on Bitcoin early, and I don't regret any of mine Bitcoin-related decisions. I'm happy to read successful stories of others, I'm glad that some people knew how to do it right and managed to benefit greatly from that. Also, I feel like I'm a risk-averse person, so I probably would not have risked investing in Bitcoin early on and not selling the minute it starts costing something significant. I did, after all, invest in Ethereum at $16, but I sold at $300. So it would have been similar with Bitcoin, even if I managed to invest in the first place.

comments.author: _BlackStar
comments.body: Not all stories shared on forum as user experience are facts, some of them are being fictitious for whatever reason. But of course there are some stories that are justifiable and I tend to believe them mainly because they are so inspiring.To this day I really see the fact that someone who has been investing in bitcoin since 2016 has changed his economic status 180 degrees. Everything changed for him because his financial status was very good since he got to know bitcoin, but I was very touched to hear his stories and the struggle before he got to know bitcoin. I just got this story since I've known this guy in the past year.

comments.author: bosede1
comments.body: I don't have any regrets as far as my investment in bitcoin, I thank God been introduced to it when I was and also thankful for investing what I had and believing in the coin. Though when I hear other peoples opinion about theirs I don't argue because if you have benefited from something you won't know the value.

comments.author: serjent05
comments.body: Quote from: mk4 on March 14, 2023, 11:13:34 AMOf course I should feel happy for people, but these stories got so redundant that I don't even know if the stories are real or if they're fabricating the stories just so they hopefully receive merits.Yeah, especially the "i help my friend, relative, neighbor to invest in Bitcoin. Though I know it is fulfilling for the mentioned parties but creating too many thread for this kind of experience is somehow redundant, I wonder why don't just they share it under the same thread or under one thread, after all, it is all about helping, teaching people to invest or learn about Bitcoin. Personally, I feel happy for those who are successful in their Bitcoin venture and feel sorry for those who lost huge amounts of money because of scam companies.   We should be vigilant in our venture into the cryptocurrency industry, many people who participate in this industry are just waiting for the right time to trick others.

comments.author: Smartprofit
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptomiles1 on March 14, 2023, 10:52:45 AMFor long now I have been reading lots of interesting testimonies around the forum about their experience and achievement they made through bitcoin progress. Something very important came into me to know how do you feels whenever someone said of their investment and how it yielded and they made fortune out of it. Do you feels your late getting involved to the industry and do you wishes to be like them, and if you were in their shoes would you be able to utilize those opportunity they got or you won't afford to bear the risk and get involved?Lets discuss wisely and get the best from ourselves.I have my own story about Bitcoin))) In 2015, my friend told me about the first cryptocurrency (Bitcoin).  We sat in a cafe with him and for three hours he drew a diagram of the Bitcoin blockchain on a napkin and talked about the various features of the first cryptocurrency (including colored coins).  I was impressed, although I understood little.  In the evening, lying in bed with my girlfriend, I told her about Bitcoin.  However, he did not impress her.  She looked at me like I was an idiot and said that my friend and I are two fools.  Then I once again tried to figure out the prospects of Bitcoin myself and saw that the price of the first cryptocurrency was constantly falling.  This convinced me that this was not the thing to be interested in.  So I missed the opportunity to invest early in Bitcoin (it was then worth a couple of hundred US dollars).  And then I broke up with this girl.

comments.author: Cryptomiles1
comments.body: Quote from: mk4 on March 14, 2023, 11:13:34 AMOf course I should feel happy for people, but these stories got so redundant that I don't even know if the stories are real or if they're fabricating the stories just so they hopefully receive merits.Well as for me i do feels happy.I don't always regret at any point because there's this adage that African do says "When you go to bed and sleep, anytime you woke is your morning" this means any time you got information you can utilize at that point without any regretting words of getting the information very late.Just as you said, most of these information might be true but due to poorly presentation might make those stories fiction.

comments.author: summonerrk
comments.body: I know that many people were brought to cryptocurrencies by friends. I've been thinking about Bitcoin since it was worth $100. Yes, I've been in crypto currency for a very long time, and my friend introduced me to crypto like this: he helped me install a wallet on my phone, and threw me a tenth of bitcoin. Unfortunately, I did not save it then, but I am grateful to him for the rest of my life now.

comments.author: Dr.Osh
comments.body: Well, we should rejoice at the accomplishments that have been made by people who have amazing stories about bitcoin. if I read someone's story about bitcoin, what's more, it's an extraordinary story, then I will make that my motivation to achieve the same achievement, or even more. If I had a chance like them, I probably wouldn't be as good as them, but I'll try my best. I have heard many success stories about trading, or businesses involving bitcoin. well, I'm just taking lessons from that, and trying to do the same thing if I were in a similar position.

comments.author: imamusma
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptomiles1 on March 14, 2023, 10:52:45 AMDo you feels your late getting involved to the industry and do you wishes to be like them, and if you were in their shoes would you be able to utilize those opportunity they got or you won't afford to bear the risk and get involved?Despite the fact that I am not as fortunate as an early adopter or big investor in bitcoin, I tend to feel grateful that I am here for bitcoin. I'm not as rich as they are, that's true because I'm not here with a strong economic background to be a big bitcoin investor.I'm sure I'm not too late, but I doubt very much that I failed to understand that bitcoin today is really higher than I imagined at the beginning of my introduction. Of course I wish I could be as lucky as them but I have to recognize that there is a certain level set for me even if it's not the way I want it to be. The conclucion is the same, I want to take advantage of opportunities and I want to get better at bitcoin like most people.
